channel.title: Noxous-net Official Source release +=|NEW|=+!
channel.description:
[center]Noxous-net official source download! [b]Since my hosting days are over, I thought that I would post on all three of the server forums titans, mopar ,silab and runelcs. If it is on any other sites then these three, it is leeched.[/b] [u]Features:[/u]
[ul][*]Auto cast (you will be attacked back) [*]Fully working slayer [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/slayer1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/slayer2.jpg[/img] [*]Veracs works, has a critical hit every so often [*]Guthans works, heals you as you hit [*]Dharoks works, the lower your health, the higher you hit [*]Funclan, its a pking minigame taht you go into two different portals, and you get a cape, depending on which portal(fire and ice team), and you don't lose any items when you die (except poison). [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/funclan.jpg[/img] [*]Use a chisel on the boxes in Richards shop to get that set. [*]Unique home [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/home.jpg[/img] [*]Under the sea train [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/train.jpg[/img] [*]Barrows minigame [*]2 pk areas located on the auto retaliate buttons, one is a strict, one on one, and teh other one is no rules. [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/pktabs.jpg[/img] [*]Working Void melee [*]Fully working ranging (you actually hit higher based on teh range skill) [*]A super set (a combonation of items i made that works really well as it is the effect of dharoks, and guthans combined, see what it is in ::updates [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/update.jpg[/img] [*]A portal room (didn't really work with that one, but its useful if you want to add alot of commands and no more tele tabs) [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/portals.jpg[/img] [*]Instead of a wishing well, I added a wishing Air obelsik (looks better I think) requires 10mil [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/obelisk1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/obelisk2.jpg[/img] [*]Money is tokkul [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/money.jpg[/img] [*]Wyvern has one of the best drops besides the Avatar in slayer (watch out, she can hit up to 100's if you attacker while you are next to her) [*]Brand new skill area (click the guthix alter for rc xp and runes) [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/skill.jpg[/img] [*]Tele tabs are colour coded: Blue= home Cyan= some sort of effect Yellow= area with monsters, no pking Red= Wild areas White= pk, don't lose your stuff area [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/teletab.jpg[/img] [*]Max levels are 135 (with the suped armors and stuff, there was a need for higher skills) [*]Summoning is the farm skill, go to ::modzone to buy summoning stuff [b]!!!WARNING!!![/b] I made the summoning stuff only avalible to mods+ ,because you can kill people with the summoned monsters in safe areas. [*]Kind of unimportant features are: In the quest tab, I cleaned out all of the old quest and added a credits section on the bottom [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/questtab.jpg[/img] ::Master does all combat only, ::pure is all skiller (mods can use ::pure) [*]All skills work, cept the farm which I changed to summoning [*]You need teh regular supplies to mine, and woodcut, avalible at there respective shops. [*]Some of prayer works, I haven't tested it fully, but the prayer spells that work are the ones dealing with str. [IMG]http://i71.photobucket.com/albums/i130/Mixxes/stuff/prayer.jpg[/img][/ul] [/center]
Btw, I used the silab client for all the pics and such.
[b]Credits:[/b] [left]Silab Garza base so 29% to him, 2% to hiya scape (where he got) 9% to pimpscape (where hiya got) 40% to me 20% to all the tuts, Shandu, and players that gave me the ideas and advice to help.[/left]
[b][u]Mirrors:[/u][/b] rapid share: [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/176179483/Noxous-Net_V2.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/176179483/Noxous-Net_V2.rar.html[/url] uppit: [url=http://uppit.com/TGTMX9]http://uppit.com/TGTMX9[/url] filefront: [url=http://files.filefront.com/Noxous+Net+V2rar/;12748243;/fileinfo.html]http://files.filefront.com/Noxous+Net+V2rar/;12748243;/fileinfo.html[/url] media fire: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=1ed39882935afd3fd2db6fb9a8902bda]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=1ed39882935afd3fd2db6fb9a8902bda[/url]
Since I am extremely bored and stuff, if you use this source, go to [url=http://noxousnet.19.forumer.com/]http://noxousnet.19.forumer.com/[/url] and say in the chat box that you are using it and what ip/port and I will get everyone I can to play (without spamming and such) and I will play. Also, go there if you need any help at all and I will provide the help. Don't make a comment if you want me to reply, I am only posting so everyone can have a chance to play this server. I will update if it is absolutly(spelling) neccecary.

item.title: Noxous-net Official Source release +=|NEW|=+!
item.dc:creator: @gonja gonja
item.description:
@gonja wrote:

[center]Noxous-net official source download!
Since my hosting days are over, I thought that I would post on all three of the server forums titans, mopar ,silab and runelcs.
If it is on any other sites then these three, it is leeched.
Features:

[ul][]Auto cast (you will be attacked back)
[]Fully working slayer

slayer1.jpg765×497

slayer2.jpg764×495

[]Veracs works, has a critical hit every so often
[]Guthans works, heals you as you hit
[]Dharoks works, the lower your health, the higher you hit
[]Funclan, its a pking minigame taht you go into two different portals, and you get a cape, depending on which portal(fire and ice team), and you don’t lose any items when you die (except poison).
funclan.jpg762×495

[]Use a chisel on the boxes in Richards shop to get that set.
[]Unique home
home.jpg762×495

[]Under the sea train
train.jpg759×495

[]Barrows minigame
[]2 pk areas located on the auto retaliate buttons, one is a strict, one on one, and teh other one is no rules.

[]Working Void melee
[]Fully working ranging (you actually hit higher based on teh range skill)
[]A super set (a combonation of items i made that works really well as it is the effect of dharoks, and guthans combined, see what it is in ::updates

[]A portal room (didn’t really work with that one, but its useful if you want to add alot of commands and no more tele tabs)
portals.jpg763×495

[]Instead of a wishing well, I added a wishing Air obelsik (looks better I think) requires 10mil
obelisk1.jpg762×493

obelisk2.jpg759×492

[]Money is tokkul

[]Wyvern has one of the best drops besides the Avatar in slayer (watch out, she can hit up to 100’s if you attacker while you are next to her)
[]Brand new skill area (click the guthix alter for rc xp and runes)
skill.jpg760×493

[]Tele tabs are colour coded:
Blue= home
Cyan= some sort of effect
Yellow= area with monsters, no pking
Red= Wild areas
White= pk, don’t lose your stuff area

[]Max levels are 135 (with the suped armors and stuff, there was a need for higher skills)
[]Summoning is the farm skill, go to ::modzone to buy summoning stuff
!!!WARNING!!! I made the summoning stuff only avalible to mods+ ,because you can kill people with the summoned monsters in safe areas.
[]Kind of unimportant features are:
In the quest tab, I cleaned out all of the old quest and added a credits section on the bottom

::Master does all combat only, ::pure is all skiller (mods can use ::pure)
[]All skills work, cept the farm which I changed to summoning
[]You need teh regular supplies to mine, and woodcut, avalible at there respective shops.
[]Some of prayer works, I haven’t tested it fully, but the prayer spells that work are the ones dealing with str.
[/ul]
[/center]

Btw, I used the silab client for all the pics and such.

Credits:
[left]Silab Garza base
so 29% to him,
2% to hiya scape (where he got)
9% to pimpscape (where hiya got)
40% to me
20% to all the tuts, Shandu,
and players that gave me the ideas
and advice to help.[/left]

Mirrors:
rapid share:
http://rapidshare.com/files/176179483/Noxous-Net_V2.rar.html
uppit:
http://uppit.com/TGTMX9
filefront:
http://files.filefront.com/Noxous+Net+V2rar/;12748243;/fileinfo.html
media fire:
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=1ed39882935afd3fd2db6fb9a8902bda

Since I am extremely bored and stuff, if you use this source, go to http://noxousnet.19.forumer.com/ and say in the chat box that you are using it and what ip/port and I will get everyone I can to play (without spamming and such) and I will play.
Also, go there if you need any help at all and I will provide the help.
Don’t make a comment if you want me to reply, I am only posting so everyone can have a chance to play this server.
I will update if it is absolutly(spelling) neccecary.

Read full topic
